description: This is a closing disclosure document that provides the final loan terms and closing costs for a real estate transaction.

principal_and_interest.instruction: The monthly payment for principal and interest

estimated_escrow.instruction: The monthly escrow payment for taxes and insurance

origination_charges.instruction: The charges associated with originating the loan

services_borrower_did_not_shop_for.instruction: The cost of services the borrower did not shop for

services_borrower_did_shop_for.instruction: The cost of services the borrower did shop for

total_loan_costs.instruction: The total loan costs paid by the borrower

taxes_and_other_government_fees.instruction: The taxes and government fees paid

prepaids.instruction: The prepaid items such as homeowner's insurance and property taxes

initial_escrow_payment.instruction: The initial escrow payment made at closing

other.instruction: Other costs such as HOA fees, home inspection, etc.

total_other_costs.instruction: The total other costs paid by the borrower

date_issued.instruction: The date the closing disclosure was issued

closing_date.instruction: The date the real estate transaction is scheduled to close

disbursement_date.instruction: The date the loan funds will be disbursed

settlement_agent.instruction: The company responsible for handling the closing and disbursement of funds

file_number.instruction: The unique identifier for this real estate transaction

property_address.instruction: The address of the property being purchased

sale_price.instruction: The agreed upon sale price of the property

loan_term.instruction: The term length of the loan, e.g. 30 years

loan_purpose.instruction: The purpose of the loan, e.g. Purchase

loan_product.instruction: The type of loan product, e.g. Fixed Rate

loan_type.instruction: The type of loan, limited to Conventional, FHA, VA, or Other

loan_id.instruction: The unique identifier for this loan

loan_amount.instruction: The total amount of the loan

interest_rate.instruction: The interest rate on the loan

monthly_principal_and_interest.instruction: The monthly payment for principal and interest

prepayment_penalty.instruction: Whether there is a prepayment penalty on the loan

prepayment_penalty_amount.instruction: The amount of the prepayment penalty

balloon_payment.instruction: Whether the loan has a balloon payment

estimated_taxes,_insurance_&_assessments.instruction: The estimated monthly amount for taxes, insurance and assessments

closing_costs.instruction: The total closing costs for the transaction

cash_to_close.instruction: The total amount the borrower needs to bring to closing

seller_credits.instruction: The amount of credits provided by the seller

other_credits.instruction: The amount of other credits provided

borrower_paid_at_closing.instruction: The total amount the borrower paid at closing

seller_paid_at_closing.instruction: The total amount the seller paid at closing

cash_to_seller.instruction: The net amount paid to the seller at closing

loan_assumption.instruction: Whether the loan can be assumed by a new buyer

demand_feature.instruction: Whether the loan has a demand feature

late_payment_fee.instruction: The late payment fee charged by the lender

negative_amortization.instruction: Whether the loan has a negative amortization feature

partial_payments.instruction: Whether the lender accepts partial payments, holds them, or does not accept them
